'''Flowtoys''' is a flow arts prop manufacturer based in San Francisco, California. The company is known for its line of LED and fire props, including the podpoi, flow wand, and capsule light systems.

== Products ==

Flowtoys manufactures props for multiple flow arts disciplines:

* '''Podpoi''': LED poi with a modular capsule light system
* '''Flowmass clubs''': LED-enabled [[Clubs (flow arts)|clubs]]
* '''Crystal staff''': LED-enabled [[Staff (flow arts)|staff]]
* '''Capsule lights''': Modular LED units used across multiple prop types
* '''Oxbow meteor''': A curved-handle [[meteor]] developed and popularized by [[Charlie Cushing]]<ref name="flowtoys-oxbow">{{cite web |url=https://flowtoys.com/oxbow |title=Oxbow |publisher=Flowtoys}}</ref>

== Significance ==

Flowtoys has been influential in popularizing [[LED props]] as an alternative and complement to [[fire spinning]]. Their modular capsule system allows a single set of LED units to be used across different prop types.
